system.effect: Sometimes found on Eldar Vessels, conceals vessels in fog. Grants +20 to Silent Running, and any Active or Focused Augury Tests have -20 penalty. Ships firing on the vessel while component is active -20 to BS Tests and -30 to Hit and Run attacks. Ship must choose to use either this or void shields, can't use both.
